episode: I paid a lot of money for people to fix up the yard. It looks presentable for the first time in years.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm finally hopeful about my front yard. I neglected it for years, but I hired some people to fix it up and it looks great.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome! It's amazing what a little help can do. How does it feel to see it all spruced up?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It feels good. Its got me motivated to keep at it and fix up the rest now.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's the spirit! Keep that momentum going!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: The only problem is how expensive it was. I hope I can figure out how to do this stuff myself from now on.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I get that, it can add up. Maybe some DIY videos could help you out!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah, I'll have to look some up. But now I have a nice yard like my neighbors.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's awesome, congrats! Enjoy it!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thanks. Now I don't have to worry about the neighbors being mad at me either. They're all hyper focused on perfect lawns.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's a relief! Enjoy fitting in.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I will. What else should I do to make it look nice? right now its just a regular lawn.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Maybe add some flowers or a small garden?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Too much upkeep required.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Got it, maybe some low-maintenance shrubs or decorative rocks?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Are there such things as low maintenance shrubs?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Yep, there are!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Like what?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Like boxwood or junipers.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Never heard of them. What about fake plants?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Fake plants could work! Low effort, still looks good.
